nodes.text: Urce Space, or the Urce sector, was a sector of the Mid Rim within the Lesser Plooriod Cluster. It was located between the Burna Trade Route and the Entana Run.
The planet Urce, a former seat of Imperial power, served as capital of the sector.
High Inquisitor Mox Slosin was transferred to Urce after the subjugation of Fitca Prime.
